column3: “I've never seen a bud so purple before!  This Indica smells smooth with a slightly sweet tang.  Very smooth smoke, and the effects hit you instantly.  Half a joint and I was out cold, happily drifting off to sleep.  Should be called Goodnight Mr. Moon".

“Have not seen dark purple like this since the late 70s and early 80s when Purple Humbolt was the rage in California.
I am growing some F1 clones and am very satisfied with their progress. 
This has a berry flavor and is some of the best indica for insomnia I ever tried.”

“Simply one of the best medicine around for sleeping! An indica true to its nature. Gorgeous looking bud, tight, compact, dense, hints of purple and a beautiful tone of green. Smell is supa dank and sweet! Can't say I taste berries but it is definitely pleasant with Earth aromas. High is extremely indica and will have you feeling spaced out, slightly sedated. Although it approaches it in a very euphoric way and settle...”

“This is a phenomenal indica that I've been wanting to try for so long and I got lucky at my local dispensary to grab the last batch. It really is a powerful relaxant. It doesn't leave you stuck, your thought process is clear, but it is VERY nap-inducing, in a good way. It will float you down gently without leaving you feeling hungover when you wake up like some indicas do. Smooth on the inhale, nice slightly sweet af...”

“Recently diagnosed with cluster headaches...and have been trying to find a strain to help....I have now found it. The tension from the headache melts away (I haven't smoked during an actual cluster episode, but there is residual tension the day after and it's pretty painful. Anyway....if you are suffering from migraines, cluster headaches, etc, please find some and try it out. I used to only smoke sativa or sativa do...”

“This strain hits smooth, and the affects come fast. Out of respect for the name I listened to some pink Floyd (which I normally don't listen to) and as a very euphoric high took over to the sounds in the music, all my pain and anxiety went away.”
“Pretty dang exciting" - Nacho Libre”"
“Would love to try this but....Wa. Is pretty far trom Co. just say'in! The name caught my eye and then when I read on ....damn just what I envisioned! Bummer!”

“There's nothing that could truly be said about this extremely rare *gem* of a strain from Exotic Genetix - at least not much which could do it proper justice.  This indica provides all one could ask for: relaxation (followed shortly after by sedation), psychedelic effects (among the most vivid of any strain out there), analgesic feeling throughout (gravity pulling you as you melt like butter), and a very nice look, s...”
“Listening to Dark Side Of The Moon album while smoking this. So far, pretty great. Peace ✌🏻”
“Best strain I've had in a while”
“such a nice heavy indica perfect for nighttime use”

“smells. ....AMAZING. ...looks.... INSANE  
a must try for everyone.  and indica..but without the sedative effects.  and I found there to he no lazy or tired feeling afterwards. just an amazing strain.”

“I have a painful chronic illness which requires ongoing treatment, and this stuff is great for pain. It puts me to sleep so I only use it at night but I have the kind of pain that keeps me up all night if not well controlled, so this stuff is just what I need.”
“I've just smoked a few bowls and I can feel that it has helped with my arthritis inflammation 😊 .. feeling relaxed 😍 lol”
“very relaxing but too much and you are stuck to the couch for the rest of the day”

“New favorite! I've had headaches every day for 2 weeks. I've tried over the counter pain killers, I've tried my hydros, I've tried drinking water until I felt like Violet Boragard. Within 30 minutes of smoking my headache melted away.  I felt so relieved I almost cried. I'm extremely grateful the bud-tender suggested this stain.   Shared a joint with my boyfriend and we both almost immediately started coming up with ...”
“Makes me feel like I'm melting into my bed.”
“Very nice Indica strain! Great for Insomnia and pain!”
“What I like to call my sleepy time tree. Good bye sleeping pills. Hello pleasant wake up!”

“wonderful colors on this indica , the smell fresh out of the bag is Pungent, looking at the bud I saw those reddish orange hairs sticking out but when you blow on the bud the red hairs sway in your breath, fantastic on the breakup of this with your fingers , I didn't have to wash my hands after breaking this bud up. When I tried this strain I had eaten an hour before and this was the first weed of the day for me. So ...”
“really nice chill to it, but found it easy to have too much”

“Got some of this from Walla Walla Weedery, grown by BudCo. This is a heavy hitter and put my all the way down to take a nap in the middle of the day. Big dusty green buds, floral smell. Would buy again but wouldn't recommend for daytime”
“For people looking to have minimal psychoactive effects this is your strain. Very relaxing, a great bedside bud. Everything in moderation including moderation”

“Talk about aromatic and bag appeal! This strain is a delight to smoke and even better to vape. Dont let the intensely fruity and sweet flavor fool you, this strain is a heavy hitter (at least the batch I had was).  Dark Purple medium sized buds were coated in trichomes. 

The medicinal effects were good for relaxation, sleep and stress relief.”
“Unviseral Herbs in CO have it.!”
“Alert enough for daytime but grounded in tasks so good for the work week!”
“has a ver calm mellow high with a smooth pungent taste but also gives you a up lifting boost.. would suggest smoke during day”
“Happy, light. Dry mouth is the only downside. Like my outside is high but my inside isn't.”

“Honestly this might be my new favourite Indica strain & that's saying a lot. The look is just absolutely beautiful. I haven't seen this much purple on a bud (excluding Grandaddy Purple & Purple Kush) in a long time! The taste is absolutely delicious. Very fruity, almost like a blueberry koolaid. The high is wonderful & for a strong Indica it does not leave you tired & lazy at all”

“Damn what a potent strain. I got blasted from resin/burnt residue. 
Very uplifting and happy feeling. And a great nights sleep!”
“This is so purple wow! And the crystal omg!! What a great strain nice and relaxing great for at home and unwinding!! Must try strain!! I will post pictures ASAP!”

“Total relaxing,
It is so fucking purple
Bright and groovy, man

Active Indica
Crystal fluffiness abounds
Good to share with pals”
“This one put me down hard and fast. Noticeable pain relief. Glad I didn’t smoke this one earlier in the day.”

“This is super dank herb. Very relaxed and sleepy lol mouth is dry but that's what ice cream is for. It does have a bit of a berry taste and aroma. The buds are very fluffy and just beautiful. I recommend for bed time or just wanna be lazy all day”
“Also, while scouring the interwebs for seeds (which are apparently now listed under Exotic Gentix archives") and also looking further into the lineage
column4: it's an indica hybrid using one of their best F2 strains (which itself has fostered many other nice indica hybrids) crossed with their own version of "Green Ribbon" (BX).

column1: If your local dispensary or seed bank happens to have this strain and you're looking for an am...”"

column3: “Definitely make sure you don't smoke too much of this strain. it delivers a very intense high, and is great is you're planning on grabbing some munchies. also had the best sleep on my life, which is great considering i'm an insomniac. nugs are super dense and are primarily purple. the only downside is the dry mouth and it can make you dizzy if you smoke too much, even if you have a high tolerance.”
“Don't make any vertical plans. This sucker will put you on your back. Great for listening to music , not so great for anything that requires sustained focus. I couldn't even watch tv on this stuff.”
“It's delicious. Strong buzz, sweet and flowery flavor, light in the trouth. The only con I see is that the flower doesn't go a long way, you need a lot for a small spliff.”
“Takes me into a dreamy state that may or may not lead to sleep.”

“Pretty good!! Never heard of this but when it came up for sale it sounded like something I needed. Of course it's an indica which I love for the evenings. Since it's cold out now it was a Hood smoke outdoors as well as in. Does have a sweet, blueberry, woody taste to it and adds a bit of eye pressure. All around A++"”"
“Heavy and psychedelic. Good for spending several hours locked to your coach and reflecting.”
“I need to try”

“Unpopular opinion, this strains high was good; well, mediocre. The tast of this strain was like i was sucking on the end of a sewer gas vent. It did relive my back pain for a bit (hence the 2 stars) Would not buy agian.”
